text: The Brilliance BC3 is a sport compact coupé produced by the joint venture of Brilliance Auto, Mitsubishi Motors, Porsche AG and BMW Group. ==Overview== Brilliance Auto Coupe rear It was originally announced at the Beijing Auto Show in 2006 as the Brilliance Zhonghua M3China Car Times 26 May 2007 then at the Geneva Motor Show in 2007 as the BC3 prototype,Ultimate Car Pages 18 April 2007 the Paris Motor Show in 2008 as the Zhonghua CoupeDesign Taxi, 10 October 2008 and at the 2009 Detroit Auto Show as the Brilliance M3.Consumer Guide Automotive 2009 The BC3 was designed by Pininfarina, the chassis was developed with assistance from Porsche Engineering and the engine developed with FEV Inc.Business Week January 2008 Despite the BC3 touring around international motor shows including Geneva, Paris and Detroit, the car is not yet widely exported. It is sold in Egypt as the Brilliance Kouper, in China as the Brilliance M3 and Germany as the "BC3 GT". ==Specifications== The BC3 is powered by a Mitsubishi designed 1.8L Turbocharged 4-cylinder petrol engine, producing and torque of , resulting in a top speed of .Brilliance Kouper Egypt website ==References== ==External links== *Brilliance M3 website *Road and Track BC3 photo gallery BC3 Category:Cars introduced in 2007 Category:Cars of China Category:Sport compact cars Category:Coupés Category:Hatchbacks Category:Front-wheel-drive sports cars Category:2010s cars
